award_title: Structure and mechanism of elastoinertial turbulence in polymer and surfactant solutions
subject: Making CFD simulations actually reusable
body:
Hi Michael,

Simulation outputs too big for supplements, code that only runs on your clusterâ€”NSF wants computational work reproducible, but most folks can't actually run a CFD parameter sweep even if they have the paper.

Built Ouro to fix this: turns simulations and workflows into building blocks others can plug into their work without recreating your entire environment.

Happy to show you. (No rush if you're heads-down before the holidays.)

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
